name: RNF specification
body:
### RNF specification

RNF stands for Read Naming Format, a generic format for assigning read names with encoded information about original positions.

[Download RNF specification](RNF.pdf)

### Links

* **Publication:** K. BÅ™inda, V. Boeva, G. Kucherov. **[RNF: a general framework to evaluate NGS read mappers](http://arxiv.org/pdf/1504.00556.pdf)**. _arXiv:1504.00556 [q-bio.GN]_, 2015.
* [RNFtools](http://github.com/karel-brinda/rnftools) - Associate software package of RNF-compatible programs.

### Contact

* karel.brinda@univ-mlv.fr
